name: Ext_R4_EvidenceVariable_ch_definition
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceVariable|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: What code or expression defines members?
element.definition: Define members of the evidence element using Codes (such as condition, medication, or observation), Expressions ( using an expression language such as FHIRPath or CQL) or DataRequirements (such as Diabetes diagnosis onset in the last year).
element.comment: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` maps to R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]`. Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition)` has no mapping Type `DataRequirement` has no mapping Type `TriggerDefinition` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` maps to R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]`. Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition)` has no mapping Type `DataRequirement` has no mapping Type `TriggerDefinition` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` maps to R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]`. Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition)` has no mapping Type `DataRequirement` has no mapping Type `TriggerDefinition` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
